title: Disciples
verses: Luke 9:23 (WEB) — “If anyone desires to come after me, let him deny himself, take up his cross daily, and follow me.”
Matthew 28:19–20 (WEB) — “Make disciples… teaching them to observe all that I commanded you.”
John 8:31 (WEB) — “If you remain in my word, then you are truly my disciples.”
John 13:34–35 (WEB) — “By this everyone will know that you are my disciples: if you have love for one another.”
body: Disciples follow Jesus in everyday life—learning His words, obeying His ways, and loving His people. Keep company with Him and help someone else do the same.
prayer: Teacher and Lord, make me Your disciple indeed. Form me by Your Word and love through me for the sake of others. Amen.
